Partnerships for Improved Data
Partnerships for Improved Data
page.enlisting:
• Forward Progress: – Daily electronic access to the bulk of COOP data by – Common QC at the RCCs and NCDC – Mechanism for convenient daily communication of • A common complaint (from management and staff, from across the US): Eliminate NCDC QC Errors As Early As Possible. • RCCs/NCDC/AASC: Datzilla for error reports to engage NWS (HQ, regions, and field) to explore changes in both QC practices and the way they do business with us. • Forward Progress:
